    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute()
             throws ApprovalRequestExecutionException
        A main function of the ApprovalRequest, the execute() method is run when all required approvals have been made. execute should perform the action or nothing if the requesting admin is supposed to try this action again.
        Specified by:
        execute in class ApprovalRequest
        Throws:
        ApprovalRequestExecutionException - on fail

      • execute

             throws ApprovalRequestExecutionException
        Throws:
        ApprovalRequestExecutionException

      • generateApprovalId

        public int generateApprovalId()
        Method that should generate an approval id for this type of approval, the same request i.e the same admin want's to do the same thing twice should result in the same approvalId.
        Specified by:
        generateApprovalId in class ApprovalRequest
        Returns:
        a hash code for the action the request is for, should be the same code every time the same action is performed.

      • getNewRequestDataAsText

        public List<ApprovalDataText> getNewRequestDataAsText​(AuthenticationToken admin)
        This method should return the request data in text representation. This text is presented for the approving administrator in order for him to make a decision about the request. Should return a List of ApprovalDataText, one for each row
        Specified by:
        getNewRequestDataAsText in class ApprovalRequest
        Parameters:
        admin - Token
        Returns:
        a List of ApprovalDataText

      • getOldRequestDataAsText

        public List<ApprovalDataText> getOldRequestDataAsText​(AuthenticationToken admin)
        This method should return the original request data in text representation. Should only be implemented by TYPE_COMPARING ApprovalRequests. TYPE_SIMPLE requests should return null; This text is presented for the approving administrator for him to compare of what will be done. Should return a Collection of ApprovalDataText, one for each row
        Specified by:
        getOldRequestDataAsText in class ApprovalRequest
        Parameters:
        admin - Token
        Returns:
        a List of ApprovalDataText

      • isExecutable

        public boolean isExecutable()
        Should return true if the request if of the type that should be executed by the last approver. False if the request admin should do a polling action to try again.
        Specified by:
        isExecutable in class ApprovalRequest
        Returns:
        False if the request admin should do a polling action to try again.
